translation: He who does all actions for Me, who regards Me as the Supreme, who is devoted to Me, who is free from attachment, who bears no enmity towards any creature, he comes to Me, O Arjuna.
commentary: 11.55 Matkarmakrt does actions for Me? Matparamah looks on Me as the Supreme? My devotee is devoted to Me? Sangavarjitah is freed from attachment? Nirvairah without enmity? sarvabhuteshu towards all creatures? who who? He he? Me to Me? Eti goes? Pandavas O Arjuna.Commentary This is the essence of the whole teaching of the Gita. He who practices this teaching will attain Supreme Bliss and Immortality. This verse
